attributes.action: IGNORE THE EU REFERENDUM RESULT AND REMAIN IN THE EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Chaos has followed the EU Referendum result, it has split friends and families, communities and counties, political parties and possibly even our country.
The Remain and Brexit campaigns, full of big personalities and squabbles over the economic impact of Brexit failed to fully portray the outcome we are now enduring - Both sides let us down. It is now time for those two sides to put away individual agendas and unite in parliament to serve the people and our country, Ignore Brexit and Remain.
attributes.background: We the undersigned wish for our government to ignore the EU Referendum Result and remain in the EU. The Result is not legally binding and our government is under no legal obligation to follow through on the outcome.
